Class ClientHearthBeat

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.network.connection.ClientHearthBeat
public class ClientHearthBeat extends Object
This Class is responsible for managing the heartbeat mechanism between the client and server. It periodically sends PingRequest messages to verify the server is still responsive. If the server fails to respond after a threshold number of attempts, it assumes a server crash and handles it accordingly. This class is implemented as a singleton and uses a scheduled executor to run periodic tasks.

    • heartBeat

      public static void heartBeat()
      Starts the heartbeat mechanism. A ping is sent every second. If more than 10 pings are sent without reset, a ServerCrashError is thrown, and the client connection is closed.

    • incrementCounter

      public static void incrementCounter()
      Increments the ping sent counter in a thread-safe manner.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets the ping sent counter to zero in a thread-safe manner.

    • shutDown

      public static void shutDown()
      Shuts down the heartbeat executor service.
